mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, salt, phone, email, status, note, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into tb_users (user_id, user_name, password, salt, phone, email, status, note, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tb_users
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_users set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from tb_users where user_name=#{username} and password=#{password}
